about_the_game:
We hope that this demo will give you a good idea of what to expect when we launch the full game!

In this demo, you will get to:

  • Access the starter area, including the first dungeon
  • About 10 unique quests
  • Acquire up to 9 gems (each gem is a potential skill you can use in battle)
  • Fight 6 different enemy types
  • And discover a little something extra on your own...



In the vast expanse of the human mind, a realm known as the Geo World exists in parallel to our world. This enigmatic world may look familiar, but it is inhabited by "shaped" creatures. For ages, a select few have been able to journey into this world through their dreams, becoming known as Dream Travelers. However, in recent times, the number of these travelers has dwindled for unknown reasons.

You begin your adventure as an unnamed protagonist on the cusp of gaining the ability to traverse this realm. Venture forth to uncover the secrets of the Geo World and restore the connection between dreams and reality.





Whether awake or asleep, this world is filled with secrets waiting to be uncovered. Stay vigilant for anything unusual and keep your mind sharp for the puzzles you may encounter on your journey.

  • You can interact with most objects in the world to either get important information or simply some "funny" quotes
  • NPC dialogue and quest availability will evolve as you progress in the game, so it's important to check in with them once in a while
  • As you complete dungeons, more and more areas on the map will open up
  • Solve harder puzzles to obtain runes that will provide you with permanent enhancements


This game offers one-on-one turn-based combat as its core system. However, as the game progresses, battles will gradually become puzzles in themselves, requiring you to find the best strategies to defeat each enemy.

  • Successfully complete quick time events to trigger a critical strike
  • Collect and fuse gems to your armor pieces to unlock powerful new attacks
  • Learn the attack patterns of strong enemies and bosses to defeat them with greater ease


This game focuses on exploration, and the story is no different. Much of the story will be up to the player to engage with or skip altogether.

  • Quests driven by the main story contain a special marker
  • Poking around books is a great way to learn hidden details



The reason for the Remastered branding is that this game is actually a revival of an old Flash game from 2010. We had as much fun working on this new version as we did on the original Flash version!

name: Geo Land - The Dream Traveler Remastered Demo
short_description: Explore the Geo World in Geo Land: The Dream Traveler - Remastered. Switch between the awake and dream states, customize your skill with gem-fused armor, solve puzzles, and uncover the secrets of the Dream Travelers.
